message_1: Which metal will displace copper from copper sulfate solution - zinc or iron? Provide the balanced chemical equation for this single replacement reaction.
message_2:
Iron will displace copper from copper sulfate solution because it is more reactive than copper. The balanced chemical equation for this single replacement reaction is:

Fe (s) + CuSO₄ (aq) → FeSO₄ (aq) + Cu (s)
